medi:segment.name: Beginning of message
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BGM, A segment by means of which the sender must uniquely identify the DOCINF message using its type and number and when necessary its function.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment identifying the documentary credit number.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date of issuance of the documentary credit, the date and/or time the message is created and, if applicable, the presentation period within which documents are to be presented.

medi:segment.name: Business function
medi:segment.medi:documentation: BUS, A segment providing information related to the type of documentary credit (i.e. irrevocable or revocable, transferable or not transferable). It may also identify the geographic environment of the documentary credit.

medi:segment.name: Parties to instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, A segment specifying special documentary credit instructions. It specifies the confirmation instructions and, if applicable, any additional conditions, the method of issuance of the documentary credit, pre-advice instructions and documents delivery instructions.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment with free text information used when additional information is needed but cannot be accommodated within other segments. This may be instructions and information about revolving documentary credits and other supplementary information.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 1: A group of segments identifying the financial institutions and account numbers involved in the documentary credit, their functions and notification references.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying the financial institution(s) associated with the documentary credit, in coded or uncoded form, their functions and account numbers involved.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying reference numbers of parties specified in the leading FII segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading FII segment to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 2: A group of segments identifying the name and address of each non-financial party involved in the transaction, their functions and notification references.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying names and addresses of the parties associated with the documentary credit, in coded or uncoded form, and their functions.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying reference numbers of parties specified in the leading NAD segment.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 3: A group of segments specifying the expiry date of the documentary credit and, if applicable, the place where the documentary credit expires for the presentation of the required documents.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the expiry date of the documentary credit.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment specifying the place where the documentary credit expires for the presentation of the required documents.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 4: A group of segments specifying the amount and currency of the documentary credit and, if applicable, any additional amounts covered under the documentary credit. It may also specify the tolerance or specification of the amount(s).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the amount and currency of the documentary credit and, if applicable, any additional amounts covered under the documentary credit.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 5: A group of segments specifying the tolerance or specification of the amount(s) specified in Segment Group 4.

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment specifying the tolerance or specification of the amount(s) specified in Segment Group 4.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the amount tolerance in percentage.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 6: A group of segments specifying from where and to where the shipment(s)under the documentary credit must be made and relevant dates for the transport of goods.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment specifying from where and to where shipment(s) under the documentary credit must be made.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date or period of shipment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 7: A group of segments specifying with whom the documentary credit is available.

medi:segment.name: Payment instructions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAI, A segment specifying with whom the documentary credit is available.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the city and/or country where the documentary credit is available with any bank.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 8: A group of segments specifying the method of availability of the documentary credit.

medi:segment.name: Payment terms basis
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PAT, A segment specifying the method of availability. It may also specify at which maturity date payment is to be made and how the maturity date is to be determined.

medi:segment.name: Financial institution information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FII, A segment identifying, when necessary, the party on whom drafts must be drawn.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying, when necessary, a specific maturity date.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying in those cases that the documentary credit should be available by mixed payment (e.g. sight payment and deferred payment) the part of the documentary credit amount that is payable by sight payment, deferred payment, etc.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying in those cases that the documentary credit should be available by mixed payment (e.g. sight payment and deferred payment) the part of the documentary credit amount in percentage which is payable by sight payment, deferred payment, etc.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying how the maturity date is to be determined or indicate at which usance time draft(s) must be drawn in uncoded form.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 9: A group of segments indicating the terms of delivery.

medi:segment.name: Terms of delivery or transport
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TOD, A segment identifying the terms of delivery.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying locations relevant to the terms of delivery specified in the leading TOD segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 10: A group of segments specifying generic instructions about transhipments and partial shipments and/or drawings under the documentary credit.

medi:segment.name: Transport service requirements
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TSR, A segment specifying whether transhipments and/or partial shipments and/or drawings are allowed or not.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying a certain city and/or country where transhipments are restricted.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 11: A group of segments specifying special instructions and related information from the Applicant to parties identified in Segment Group 1 and/or Segment Group 2.

medi:segment.name: Parties to instruction
medi:segment.medi:documentation: INP, A segment identifying the party which is to carry out the instruction and the party to be contacted followed by the instruction in coded form.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying instructions in uncoded form.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the earliest and latest dates and/or times by which the specified instructions must be carried out. It will be repeated when more than one date or time is to be provided.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 12: A group of segments providing special information not covered by other segments, for use by central and regulatory authorities requiring statistical and other types of data. It includes identification of the authority for which the information is intended followed by free text information.

medi:segment.name: General indicator
medi:segment.medi:documentation: GIS, A segment identifying what processing should be completed by regulatory authorities.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment giving the amount and the currency of each transaction to be reported.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment giving different origins/destinations (places) of goods/investment/services.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying the central/regulatory authority in coded or uncoded form.

medi:segment.name: Requirements and conditions
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RCS, A segment giving the nature (e.g. goods, transport services) and direction of each transaction to be recorded in coded form.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying supplementary information for the central/regulatory authority in uncoded form.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 13: A group of segments providing full details of all charges or allowances, and associated taxes, that apply to a particular transaction, together with information as to who bears the charges and to which account they have been directed. A total value of all charges plus allowances may be given for every account to which charges may be directed. Where charges are subject to taxation this may also be specified.

medi:segment.name: Financial charges allocation
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FCA, A segment specifying the method for allocation of charges and allowances and identifying an account to which such charges or allowances were directed where it is different from the principal account.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the basis amount from which charges are calculated, if different from the overall amount of the original documentary credit. It also giving the total value of charges and/or allowances, and associated taxes, that relate to an account for charges/allowances.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 14: A group of segments providing a detail breakdown of all charges (or allowances) and associated charges (or allowances).

medi:segment.name: Allowance or charge
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALC, A segment used to provide full details of each charge or allowance for which the Applicant is liable. Included are full details of the method of calculating the charge.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying the percentage used for calculating the charges (or allowances).

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment identifying the amount of charges (or allowances) and/or specifying the basis amount from which charges (or allowances) may be calculated if different from the FCA segment.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the charges will be debited.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 15: A group of segments describing any taxes associated with charges and their amount.

medi:segment.name: Duty/tax/fee details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: TAX, A segment identifying any taxes related to a specific charge.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying the total amount of the tax and the basis of calculation.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the effective date and/or time the rate of exchange was fixed.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 16: A group of segments giving references and where necessary, their dates, relating to the description of goods or services (e.g. purchase order, delivery contract) followed by the description of goods or services in coded or uncoded form.

medi:segment.name: Reference
medi:segment.medi:documentation: RFF, A segment specifying the reference number of a purchase order, delivery contract, etc.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment specifying the date related to the reference number specified in the leading RFF segment.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying the description of goods or services in free text form.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 17: A group of segments specifying the documents required under the documentary credit and the requirements for each document. It may also identify party(ies) related to these requirements.

medi:segment.name: Document/message details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DOC, A segment specifying the documents required under the documentary credit and the number of copies and originals of each document required.

medi:segment.name: Monetary amount
medi:segment.medi:documentation: MOA, A segment specifying, when necessary, the value of insurance for an insurance certificate or an insurance policy in monetary amount and/or the amount of a debit or credit note.

medi:segment.name: Percentage details
medi:segment.medi:documentation: PCD, A segment specifying, when necessary, the value of insurance for an insurance certificate or an insurance policy in percentage and/or the percentage of a debit or credit note.

medi:segment.name: Place/location identification
medi:segment.medi:documentation: LOC, A segment identifying the city and/or country where claims under an insurance certificate or an insurance policy are payable.

medi:segment.name: Free text
medi:segment.medi:documentation: FTX, A segment specifying documentary requirements in uncoded form.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 18: A segment group specifying the documentary requirements in coded form for documents specified in the DOC segment of Segment Group 12.

medi:segment.name: Additional information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: ALI, A segment specifying the documentary requirements in coded form and, where necessary, the country of origin.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 19: A group of segments identifying party(ies) related to the ALI segment in Segment Group 13. It may also include contact information about each party, when necessary.

medi:segment.name: Name and address
medi:segment.medi:documentation: NAD, A segment identifying party(ies) related to the ALI segment in Segment Group 18, in coded or uncoded form, and their functions.

medi:segment.name: Contact information
medi:segment.medi:documentation: CTA, A segment identifying a person or a department for the party specified in the leading NAD segment to whom communication should be directed.

medi:segment.name: Communication contact
medi:segment.medi:documentation: COM, A segment identifying communication type(s) and number(s) of person(s) or department(s) specified in the associated CTA segment.

medi:segmentGroup.medi:documentation: Segment group 20: A group of segments specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the DOCINF message.

medi:segment.name: Authentication result
medi:segment.medi:documentation: AUT, A segment specifying details of any authentication (validation) procedures applied to the DOCINF message.

medi:segment.name: Date/time/period
medi:segment.medi:documentation: DTM, A segment identifying the validation date/time.
